definition: variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
clamor raises the dust (idiom); a tremendous clamor/to raise a tremendous stink
so much so that/to the extent that/even
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
lit. not requiring a detailed understanding (idiom); only looking for an overview/not bothered with the details/superficial/content with shallow understanding
to push sb too far/to go too far (in oppressing people)
see 一之為甚|一之为甚[yi1 zhi1 wei2 shen4]

sentences.english: When it drizzles in summer, hiking can be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天下毛毛雨的天气里，徒步旅行甚是惬意。

sentences.english: The morning session of the seminar was not well attended.
sentences.chinese: 这个研讨会的晨会出席状况不甚理想。

sentences.english: I oversleep again this morning and was almost late for work.
sentences.chinese: 本日早上又睡过甚了，上班差点迟到。

sentences.english: It strikes a tone of irreverence and sarcasm that teenagers often appreciate.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们都喜欢广告里面那种不甚恭敬和讽刺的基调。

sentences.english: It means that the transgression in the Early Ordovician was more extensive than that in the Cambrian .
sentences.chinese: 这表明早奥陶世的海进比寒武纪的更甚了。

sentences.english: Shimei answered the king, 'What you say is good.
People who get into top colleges have deep interests they love to talk about, maybe a little too much even.
sentences.chinese: 特别是名校的学生，一说到这个甚至会有点感动过甚。

sentences.english: Then Haman was afraid before the king and the queen.
sentences.chinese: 哈曼在王和王后面前就甚惊惶。

sentences.english: The word of the Lord you have spoken is good,' Hezekiah replied.
sentences.chinese: 希西家对以赛亚说，你所说耶和华的话甚好。

sentences.english: That man is not very articulate.
Even worse, have you ever done it to your clients?
sentences.chinese: 或者更甚，你也曾像这样让你的客户等过？

sentences.english: Singapore's caning is one of the most disputed judicial punishments in the world, and is often misunderstood to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡鞭刑极富有争议，国内外对此刑罚误解甚多。

sentences.english: And I was very angry when I heard their cry and these words.
sentences.chinese: 我听见他们呼号说这些话，便甚发怒。

sentences.english: Some areas of the brain, if not stimulated, will atrophy and die.
sentences.chinese: 大脑的某些区域如果没有受到促进就会萎缩更甚死亡。

sentences.english: Many servants are breaking away from their masters these days.
sentences.chinese: 近来忤逆主人奔逃的仆人甚多。

sentences.english: Viceroys who were often no better than bandits.
sentences.chinese: 往往和盗匪无甚差别的总督大人们。

definition: different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
that being the case/then/in that case
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
